Read YAML Sample Data and Metrics

Source: R/readYAML.R
readYAML.Rd

Read YAML Sample Data and Metrics

readYAMLSampleData(file)

readYAMLSampleMetrics(file)

Arguments

file

string. File path to bcbio project-summary.yaml.

Value

DataFrame.

Note

Metrics are only generated for a standard RNA-seq run with aligned counts. Fast RNA-seq mode with lightweight counts (pseudocounts) doesn't output the same metrics into the YAML.

See also

Other Read Functions: readDataVersions, readLog, readProgramVersions, readSampleData, readTx2gene

Examples

file <- file.path(bcbioBaseCacheURL, "summary.yaml")

# Sample metadata
x <- readYAMLSampleData(file)
#> Reading sample metadata from YAML...
#> Reading summary.yaml...
print(x)
#> DataFrame with 4 rows and 5 columns
#>          sampleName description genomeBuild    group
#>            <factor>    <factor>    <factor> <factor>
#> group1_1   group1_1    group1_1        mm10     ctrl
#> group1_2   group1_2    group1_2        mm10     ctrl
#> group2_1   group2_1    group2_1        mm10       ko
#> group2_2   group2_2    group2_2        mm10       ko
#>                                                              samRef
#>                                                            <factor>
#> group1_1 /groups/bcbio/bcbio_dev/genomes/Mmusculus/mm10/seq/mm10.fa
#> group1_2 /groups/bcbio/bcbio_dev/genomes/Mmusculus/mm10/seq/mm10.fa
#> group2_1 /groups/bcbio/bcbio_dev/genomes/Mmusculus/mm10/seq/mm10.fa
#> group2_2 /groups/bcbio/bcbio_dev/genomes/Mmusculus/mm10/seq/mm10.fa

# Sample metrics
x <- readYAMLSampleMetrics(file)
#> Reading sample metrics from YAML...
#> Reading summary.yaml...
print(x)
#> DataFrame with 4 rows and 16 columns
#>          averageInsertSize duplicates duplicationRateOfMapped exonicRate
#>                  <numeric>  <numeric>               <numeric>  <numeric>
#> group1_1                 0          0       0.557467500859631      0.859
#> group1_2                 0          0       0.589046470275948      0.882
#> group2_1                 0          0       0.577239972583871     0.8632
#> group2_2                 0          0       0.582829896318991     0.8713
#>          intergenicRate intronicRate mappedPairedReads mappedReads percentGC
#>               <numeric>    <numeric>         <numeric>   <numeric> <numeric>
#> group1_1         0.0663       0.0747                 0    22062337        48
#> group1_2         0.0599       0.0581                 0    25852621        48
#> group2_1         0.0661       0.0707                 0    25172084        47
#> group2_2         0.0635       0.0652                 0    25100941        48
#>          qualityFormat         rrna         rrnaRate sequenceLength
#>               <factor>    <numeric>        <numeric>       <factor>
#> group1_1      standard  42218.63884 0.00206940785504          25-75
#> group1_2      standard 48275.488632 0.00197008767899          25-75
#> group2_1      standard 38893.777113 0.00166562268984          25-75
#> group2_2      standard  40831.69201   0.001737245817          25-75
#>          sequencesFlaggedAsPoorQuality totalReads  x5x3Bias
#>                              <numeric>  <numeric> <numeric>
#> group1_1                             0   22339941      1.01
#> group1_2                             0   26168288      1.04
#> group2_1                             0   25490090         1
#> group2_2                             0   25399483      0.98
